WorkflowInfo.Name: Create new user accounts from a pre defined list
WorkflowInfo.Description: Create new users accounts according to list in an excel file or memory table.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ADCreateAccount;Assembly=ADCreateAccount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="CreateMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="4" TableName="UserDetails" RowNumber="3" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="UserName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="FirstName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="LastName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="EmailAddress" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>John</UserName>
 <FirstName>John</FirstName>
 <LastName>Smith</LastName>
 <EmailAddress>John.Smith@ayehu.com</EmailAddress>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>Dexter</UserName>
 <FirstName>Dexter</FirstName>
 <LastName>Morgan</LastName>
 <EmailAddress>Dexter.Morgan@ayehu.com</EmailAddress>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>Bill</UserName>
 <FirstName>Bill</FirstName>
 <LastName>Compton</LastName>
 <EmailAddress>Bill.Compton@ayehu.com</EmailAddress>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="TotalUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="UserDetails" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FirstName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="LastName" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="EmailAddress" ColumnNumber="4" ResultSet="%UserDetails%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="UserDetails" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:ADCreateAccount Password="" LastName="%LastName%" TimeInSeconds="0" FullName="%FirstName% %LastName%" HostName="AD-Server" Chkpasswordexpires="False" DisplayName="AD Create Account" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" Description="Active directory create new account." Path="\Users" Initials="" TypeName="ADCreateAccount" LoginName="%UserName%" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" FirstName="%FirstName%" x:Name="CreateUserAccount" Timeout="00:01:00" LoginPassword="pickard$3" UserName="" Email="%EmailAddress%" Chkpasswordnextlogin="True" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process uses an Excel file to create new users in AD. The Excel file contains the user name, first name, last name and email address, and you can add more details to it as you wish (such as cell phone number or employee ID). You can also use the Generate Password activity to create different password for each user and send it to the user by a text message after creation. The Excel file can be generated from your HR system and be easily used by eyeShare in this simple process.
